Scrolls

Scrolls are consumable magical items in Remixed Dungeon that produce powerful single-use effects when read.

Types of Scrolls

  • Scroll of Identify - Identifies items
  • Scroll of Teleportation - Teleports to random location
  • Scroll of Remove Curse - Removes curses from equipment
  • Scroll of Magic Mapping - Maps the current level
  • Scroll of Recharging - Recharges wands and other items
  • Scroll of Lullaby - Puts enemies to sleep
  • Scroll of Psionic Blast - Area damage effect
  • Scroll of Terror - Causes enemies to flee in fear
  • Scroll of Upgrade - Improves a single item
  • Scroll of Weapon Upgrade - Upgrades a weapon specifically
  • Scroll of Challenge - Challenges all monsters to fight the hero
  • Scroll of Mirror Image - Creates mirror images of the hero
  • Scroll of Domination - Dominates a single enemy
  • Scroll of Summoning - Summons a monster as a pet
  • Scroll of Curse - Curses the hero's equipped items

Mechanics

  • Consumption: Single use effect, then disappears
  • Reading: Activated by reading the scroll
  • Area Effect: Many scrolls affect an area around the hero
  • Line of Sight: Some scrolls require line of sight to targets
  • Identification: Unknown scrolls must be identified to see their effect

Strategy

  • Emergency Use: Keep some scrolls for emergency situations
  • Preparation: Use mapping and identify scrolls strategically
  • Combat: Some scrolls are powerful in combat situations
  • Efficiency: Use scrolls that complement your current equipment

Acquisition

  • Found in treasure rooms
  • Available in shops
  • Dropped by enemies
  • Generated by certain items or mechanics

See Also

  • Identification - Process for identifying scrolls
  • Spell Book - Alternative to scrolls
